CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 16, 1945 page 13 reads: "Miss Okinawa --The Third Amphibious Marine Corps, engaged in bloody Okinawa fighting in the pacific, has selected Miss Ruth Simmons of Monongahela, as their No. 1 morale builder. They have chosen her to represent the island they are taking from the Japanese. Miss Simmons is a graduate student at the University of Pittsburgh, a member of AKA and very lovely to look at. --Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Ruth Simmons wearing suit and flowers behind both ears, standing in front of Schenley Fountain, Oakland
